strapiPost.title: Weekend Roundup
strapiPost.content:
The weekend is back, and so are some staples of the region. If you've been looking for a fun way to unwind over the next couple days, look no further.

  • More to the market: Local farmer's markets are always a favorite. Visit any downtown, and you're in for an experience.
  • K9 and wine: Bring your family and 4 legged friend to Sassafras Vineyard this weekend for Dog Days of Summer.
  • Music Fest: Chamber Music Fest continues through Saturday with plenty of other live music options as well.
  • Outdoor film series: CBMAA is inviting people over to watch The Goonies outside tonight.
  • Bark at the ball park: Sunday, the NWA Naturals invite you and your furry friends to the ball park.
  • Tour de Frida: An art tour on bikes presented by Latinas Bikes is taking place tomorrow in Fayetteville.
  • Hip Hop Cares: An event with 100% going to charity, local artists showoff their music for a good cause.
  • Weekend of vaccines: Still need your first or second shot - find a location convenient to you.

Enjoy the weekend, and we'll catch you right back here on Monday!
